abstract: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steel manufacturer, announced on Tuesday that it was pulling out of a $4.9 billion joint deal to acquire Macarthur Coal of Australia, leaving Peabody Energy as the sole buyer.
snippet: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steel manufacturer, announced on Tuesday that it was pulling out of a $4.9 billion joint deal to acquire Macarthur Coal of Australia, leaving Peabody Energy as the sole buyer.
lead_paragraph: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steel manufacturer, announced on Tuesday that it was pulling out of a $4.9 billion joint bid with Peabody Energy to acquire Macarthur Coal of Australia.

headline.main: ArcelorMittal Backs Out of Bid for Macarthur Coal
